Test Name: MAYOCOMPLETE Sarcoma Mutation Panel (Next-Generation Sequencing, Tumor)
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tumor tissue or fresh/frozen tumor tissue
Purpose: To detect clinically significant sarcoma gene mutations using next-generation sequencing.
Container: FFPE tissue block or unstained slides; cryovial/appropriate frozen tissue container for fresh or frozen specimens
Equipment: NGS sequencer (e.g., Illumina HiSeq/MiSeq), DNA extraction kit, PCR thermal cycler, magnetic stand, Bioanalyzer (or equivalent), computer with bioinformatics software
